arguments.text: An individual who is unsure how to establish a new middle school team might not be the most suitable person for that role.
arguments.speaker: S2

arguments.text: Middle school students differ significantly from high school students in terms of knowledge, skills, focus, and interests, and should not be considered merely "small high schoolers."
arguments.speaker: S2

arguments.text: Offering services to an existing middle school team is a good way to gain an understanding of what is involved in coaching and what students need.
arguments.speaker: S2

arguments.text: Connecting with the NY Parli group could simplify the process of starting a middle school parli club in NYC.
arguments.speaker: S3
